item.title: TopicTensor: Instagram topics
item.description: The Influencer selection problem Advertisers using influencer posts to promote products and services have a big problem called targeting. If an advertiser advertises, for example, through Google Ads, he can focus on an arbitrarily narrow thematic audience segment that exactly matches the goods and services that he is promoting to the market. There is no such possibility on social networks: there are millions of potential influencers on Instagram where you can advertise.
